content:
I'm glad I could remind you about your brother's wedding present! It's great that you've started working on the quilt, and I'm happy to help you with the pattern and fabric combinations.

Earthy tones are a wonderful choice to reflect your brother's love for the outdoors. You can create a beautiful, natural-looking quilt that will resonate with his style. Take your time, and don't worry if it takes a bit longer than expected. The end result will be worth it!

If you need any more guidance or inspiration, feel free to ask. I'm here to help you create a stunning quilt that your brother and his partner will treasure.
